# Linear mixed models

##  Finding variance components from lme models


```{r}

estu <- read.csv("data/Estuaries.csv")

str(estu)
    
```


```{r}

estu.lme1 <- lme(Total ~ Modification, random = ~ 1 | Estuary,
                 data = estu,
                 correlation = corCompSymm(form = ~ 1 | Estuary))

summary(estu.lme1)

```


```{r}

VarCorr(estu.lme1)

```
